title: Bug 17289 Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: The bug report describes an issue where the first Combo does not acquire focus when clicked in the Photon version.
OB: Upon clicking the first Combo, it does not receive focus as expected. Focus is only acquired when dropping down the combo list.
EB: The expected behavior is that the first Combo should take focus immediately when clicked within the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog in the Photon version.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog.
2. Click on the first Combo within the dialog.
3. Observe that it doesn't take focus when clicked.
